snippet: The February announcement that Arsenio Hall’s syndicated late-night show would return for a second season turned out to be both premature and mistaken.
abstract: Announcement that late-night television show hosted by Arsenio Hall would return for second season is rescinded when CBS Television Distribution cancels it due to ratings decline among target viewers.
lead_paragraph: The February announcement that Arsenio Hall’s syndicated late-night show would return for a second season turned out to be both premature and mistaken.
